description.p: Get the date value NrOfYears years ahead of Date.

prototypes.prototype: AddYearsToDate as D (Date as D, NrOfYears as N)

discussion.p: The AddYearsToDate function computes a new date by adding years to a date field.

example.caption: AddYearsToDate() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 CurrentDate() AS Now, AddYearsToDate(CurrentDate(), 1) AS Expr1 FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:00:00 00 am|10/10/2020 12:00:00 00 am
